Stream Definition By Threshold

Source: R/threshold.R
taudem_threshold.Rd

Stream Definition By Threshold

Usage

taudem_threshold(
  input_area_grid,
  output_stream_raster_grid = NULL,
  mask_file = NULL,
  threshold_parameter = 100,
  n_processes = getOption("traudem.n_processes", 1)
)

Arguments

input_area_grid

File name for grid to be thresholded.

output_stream_raster_grid

File name for stream raster grid.

mask_file

File name for grid used to mask the output stream raster, or general thresholded grid.

threshold_parameter

Threshold parameter.

n_processes

Number of processes for mpiexec. If NULL TauDEM is called without mpiexec.

Value

Path to output file (invisibly)

Details

See https://hydrology.usu.edu/taudem/taudem5/help53/StreamDefinitionByThreshold.html

Examples

# \dontrun{
test_dir <- withr::local_tempdir()
 file.copy(
   system.file("test-data", "MED_01_01.tif", package = "traudem"),
   file.path(test_dir, "MED_01_01.tif")
 )
#> Warning: cannot create file '/tmp/RtmpdlGasT/file3f442f2f9139/MED_01_01.tif', reason 'No such file or directory'
#> [1] FALSE
filled_pit <- taudem_pitremove(file.path(test_dir, "MED_01_01.tif"))
#> Error in taudem_pitremove(file.path(test_dir, "MED_01_01.tif")): Can't find file /tmp/RtmpdlGasT/file3f442f2f9139/MED_01_01.tif (input_elevation_grid)
outputs <- taudem_d8flowdir(filled_pit)
#> Error in file.exists(input_elevation_grid): object 'filled_pit' not found
outputs
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'outputs' not found
contributing_area_grid <- taudem_aread8(outputs$output_d8flowdir_grid)
#> Error in file.exists(input_d8flowdir_grid): object 'outputs' not found
contributing_area_grid
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'contributing_area_grid' not found
thresholded <- taudem_threshold(contributing_area_grid)
#> Error in file.exists(input_area_grid): object 'contributing_area_grid' not found
thresholded
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'thresholded' not found
# }
